docna.cdata!:
India - Pochampad Irrigation Project :
            Credit 0268 - Project Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
India - Pochampad Irrigation
            Project : Credit 0268 - Project Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
India - Pochampad Irrigation Project :
            Credit 0268 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
India - Pochampad Irrigation
            Project : Credit 0268 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed credit would assist in
            financing the completion of the first phase of the Pochampad
            Irrigation Scheme. The first phase comprises construction of
            a dam on the Godavari River, a main canal and a distribution
            system to serve 100,000 ha, as well as agricultural support
            services and construction of village roads.
